title: Lessons from a teenage polyglot | Tim Doner | TEDxTeen

media:group.media:title: Lessons from a teenage polyglot | Tim Doner | TEDxTeen
media:group.media:description:
Tim Doner shares how becoming fluent in more than six languages offered him meaningful opportunities that went beyond broadening his vocabulary. This talk was filmed at TEDxTeen. 

Watch the full talk here: https://youtu.be/xNmf-G81Irs

All TEDx events are organized independently by volunteers in the spirit of TED's mission of ideas worth spreading. To learn more about the TEDx SHORTS podcast, the TEDx program, or give feedback on this episode, please visit http://go.ted.com/tedxshorts.
